message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 4000, a decent offer, but I want a bit more for myself
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not giving up too much
I'll give you 3500, but I'm getting closer to my target, don't expect much more
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up all the way
I'll give you 3000, but I'm not getting any younger, I want a better deal
